message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $15000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500. Can we meet at this price?

I'm getting close to your desired price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $10000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500. Can we meet at this price?
